verses.verse: Then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>, and <S%H6030>said<s%>,
Who is this that <S%H2821>darkeneth<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> By <S%H4405>words<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
Gird <S%H247>up<s%> now thy <S%H2504>loins<s%> like a <S%H1397>man<s%>; For I will demand of <S%H7592>thee<s%>, and declare thou unto me.
Where <S%H375><s%> wast thou when I laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5046>Declare<s%>, if thou <S%H3045>hast<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
Who <S%H7760>determined<s%> the <S%H4461>measures<s%> <S%H3045>thereof<s%>, if thou knowest? Or who <S%H5186>stretched<s%> the line upon <S%H6957>it<s%>?
Whereupon were the <S%H134>foundations<s%> thereof <S%H2883>fastened<s%>? Or who <S%H3384>laid<s%> the <S%H6438>corner<s%> - stone <S%H68>thereof<s%>,
When the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H7442>sang<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, And all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> shouted for <S%H7321>joy<s%>?
Or who shut <S%H5526>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H1817>doors<s%>, When it brake <S%H1518>forth<s%>, as if it had issued <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7358>womb<s%>;
When I <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H6051>clouds<s%> the <S%H3830>garment<s%> <S%H6205>thereof<s%>, And thick darkness a <S%H2854>swaddling-band<s%> for it,
And <S%H7665>marked<s%> out for it my <S%H2706>bound<s%>, And <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> and <S%H1817>doors<s%>,
And <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5704>Hitherto<s%> shalt thou <S%H935>come<s%>, but no <S%H3254>further<s%>; And here shall thy <S%H1347>proud<s%> <S%H1530>waves<s%> be <S%H7896>stayed<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> since thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7837>began<s%>, And caused the dayspring to <S%H3045>know<s%> its <S%H4725>place<s%>;
That it might take <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be shaken out of <S%H5287>it<s%>?
It is <S%H2015>changed<s%> as <S%H2563>clay<s%> under the <S%H2368>seal<s%>; And all things <S%H3320>stand<s%> forth as a <S%H3830>garment<s%>:
And from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4513>withholden<s%>, And the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
Hast thou <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5033>springs<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>? Or hast thou <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H2714>recesses<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%>?
Have the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed<s%> unto <S%H7200>thee<s%>? Or hast thou seen the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H995>comprehended<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in its <S%H7338>breadth<s%>? <S%H5046>Declare<s%>, if thou knowest it <S%H3045>all<s%>.
Where is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%>? And as for <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, where is the place <S%H4725>thereof<s%>,
That thou shouldest <S%H3947>take<s%> it to the <S%H1366>bound<s%> <S%H995>thereof<s%>, And that thou shouldest discern the <S%H5410>paths<s%> to the house <S%H1004>thereof<s%>?
Doubtless <S%H3045><s%>, thou knowest, for thou wast then <S%H3205>born<s%>, And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>!
Hast thou <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%>, Or hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail<s%>,
Which I have <S%H2820>reserved<s%> against the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, Against the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%> and <S%H4421>war<s%>?
By <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H2505>parted<s%>, Or the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
Who hath <S%H6385>cleft<s%> a <S%H8585>channel<s%> for the <S%H7858>waterflood<s%>, Or the <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the <S%H6963>thunder<s%>;
To cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on a <S%H776>land<s%> where no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4057>is<s%>; On the wilderness, wherein there is no <S%H120>man<s%>;
To <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H4875>waste<s%> and <S%H7722>desolate<s%> <S%H4161>ground<s%>, And to cause the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> to spring <S%H6779>forth<s%>?
Hath <S%H3426><s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%>? Or who hath <S%H3205>begotten<s%> the <S%H96>drops<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%>?
Out of whose <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H7140>ice<s%>? And the hoary <S%H3713>frost<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, who hath gendered <S%H3205>it<s%>?
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves and become like <S%H68>stone<s%>, And the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> is <S%H3920>frozen<s%>.
Canst thou <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H4575>cluster<s%> of the <S%H3598>Pleiades<s%>, Or <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4189>bands<s%> of <S%H3685>Orion<s%>?
Canst thou lead <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H4216>Mazzaroth<s%> in their <S%H6256>season<s%>? Or canst thou <S%H5148>guide<s%> the <S%H5906>Bear<s%> with her <S%H1121>train<s%>?
Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>? Canst thou <S%H7760>establish<s%> the <S%H4896>dominion<s%> thereof in the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
Canst thou lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, That <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> may cover <S%H3680>thee<s%>?
Canst thou <S%H7971>send<s%> forth <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>, that they may <S%H3212>go<s%>, And say unto <S%H559>thee<s%>, Here we are?
Who hath <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts<s%>? Or who hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7907>mind<s%>?
Who can <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>? Or who can <S%H7901>pour<s%> out the <S%H5035>bottles<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,
When the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3332>runneth<s%> into a <S%H4165>mass<s%>, And the <S%H7263>clods<s%> cleave fast <S%H1692>together<s%>?
Canst thou <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> for the <S%H3833>lioness<s%>, Or <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> the <S%H2416>appetite<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>,
When they <S%H7817>couch<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens<s%>, And <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H5521>covert<s%> <S%H3926>to<s%> lie in <S%H695>wait<s%>?

Who <S%H3559>provideth<s%> for the <S%H6158>raven<s%> his <S%H6718>prey<s%>, When his young <S%H3206>ones<s%> <S%H7768>cry<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, And <S%H8582>wander<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H400>food<s%>?
